addresses.title: Exercise-0: Build Theia Application
Exercise-1: Implement Open Handler
addresses.details: In this exercise, you learn how to add a new widget to the shell and get familiar with widget's lifecycle.

addresses.title: Exercise-2: Improve Greeting React Component
addresses.details: In this exercise, you learn basics of React and how to integrate it.

addresses.title: Exercise-3: Implement UI Schema Support for JSON-Form
addresses.details: In this exercise, you learn how to access file models and connect them with widgets.
